The image in question was flagged by Fac: 2. The original image, taken by Reuters photographer Jason Reed in 2011, shows Barack Obama smiling and shaking hands with then-Indian Prime Minister Manmohan Singh, not with Hassan Rouhani.
U: S. Rep. Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., tweeted the manipulated image, claiming that "the world is a better place without these guys in power."
PolitiFact previously fact: checked a super PAC supporting U.S. Sen. Ron Johnson, R-Wis., for using the same manipulated image in 2015 and rated it as "Pants on Fire," indicating it was completely false.
